name: warcraft
description: - we need modules because we need to break up a program into several files - explain that you can export any data type: integer, array, object, function, etc. Most commonly: objects. - warcraft example: index.js peasant.js, building.js, resources.js 	- building can train a peasant 	- when a peasant is trained, we use up 20 gold and 4 food. 	- resources start out at 100 gold, 20 food.
